channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Welcome to My Analytics site
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Welcome to My Analytics site

item.title: Campaign Dashboard
item.description: The dashboard display the relationship between the type of promotional campaign held by the company and its sales performance throughout the year 2017. Some points that worth for the company to investigate: Should management organise similar campaign that can improve the daily sales during holiday or special festival seasons in the future? Interactive Covid-19 Dashboard Does the campaigns held by the company are too confusing or not actrative to the customers that led to poor sales in these 2 periods?

item.title: Customer and Potential Customer Dashboard
item.description: The first dashboard is showing the sales performance of each product category, USA customers origin, their age group and gender. Dashboard 1 - Customer Dashboard This dashboard allow management to drill down from product and customer aspect to understand their relationship. Here are some example of the insights that we can get from this dashboard: What is the total sales average sales and number of customers from specific part of USA?

item.title: Covid-19 Dashboard
item.description: This is the Covid-19 dashboard. The data is extracted from Worldometers as at 26 July 2021, 2pm Malaysia time. This interactive dashboard will display the Total cases, Active cases, Total death, Total recovered and Serious cases of Covid-19 worldwide. The information projected from the dashboard can use as awarness to citizen and travelers of the seriousness of Covid-19 cases in respective country. This dashboard can be further enhanced with additional data if it is available for public.

item.title: Retail Segmentation
item.description: The aim of this analysis task is to demonstrate the steps to perform customers segmentation on retail mall dataset using Machine Learning algorithms. Three algorithms such as KMeans, Affinity Propagation and DBSCAN, will be presented and compared. This notebook is divided into six main sections: Introduction, Preview of data, Exploratory Data Analysis, Clustering, Comparison and discussion. Segmentation of the retail customers based on Age and income using three unique algorithms.

item.title: Power BI Interactive Dashboard
item.description: This is a dashboard that I build to demonstrate my use of business intelligence skills in my daily job. To access the dashboard file, please click this link https://github.com/Alvinygno/Dashboards_BI/blob/main/Dashboard_AY_v2.pbix The sales, product and customer dashboard was customised for executives to be used in car accessories business. The dashboard allows the executives to view their monthly sales, monthly return and monthly revenue, top sales product, top profitable product, most frequent customer. KPI gauges are displayed to compare current and previous performance.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can reach out to me through your organization or personal email. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
